Using I20061007-1903. When I open the properties of the Files subsystem of a dstore connector and select the Services page, I get a 
class cast exception:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.rse.services.dstore.files.DStoreFileService
at org.eclipse.rse.subsystems.files.core.servicesubsystem.FileServiceSubSystemConfiguration.getFileService(FileServiceSubSystemConfiguration.java:54)
at org.eclipse.rse.subsystems.files.core.servicesubsystem.FileServiceSubSystemConfiguration.getService(FileServiceSubSystemConfiguration.java:49)
at org.eclipse.rse.ui.widgets.services.FactoryServiceElement.getService(FactoryServiceElement.java:67)
a
This should hopefully be a simple fix.

That's odd.  I can't reproduce this.  The line of code in the stack with the exception is this:

		IFileService service = (IFileService)_services.get(host);

The thing is DStoreFileService is an IFileService:

public class DStoreFileService extends AbstractDStoreService 
                         implements IFileService, IUniversalDataStoreConstants

So I'm not sure why this exception would occur.
It was probably a configuration error (I had some old rse plugins in my installation)...
